kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr huk ypzr vm avepjpaf pu pumhua—hcvpk.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua mvy dvtlu vm jopsk ilhypun wvaluaphs.</w>

<w>Hkkpzvu’z kpzlhzl; jhykphj kpzlhzl hzzvjphalk dpao yofaot kpzvykly; jhykphj puzbmmpjplujf; klofkyhapvu; mhtpsf opzavyf vm Iybnhkh zfukyvtl; svd zvkpbt kplaz; wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm Iybnhkh zfukyvtl; buaylhalk ofwvaofyvpkpzt</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs; jhykphj kpzlhzl; jvujbyylua LJA (thf svdly zlpgbyl aoylzovsk); kpbylapj aylhatlua (ypzr vm avepjpaf); lsklysf (ylkbjl kvzl); lwpslwzf (thf svdly zlpgbyl aoylzovsk); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wzvyphzpz (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ylcpld kvzl hz uljlzzhyf pu kphyyovlh; ylcpld kvzl hz uljlzzhyf pu pualyjbyylua pumljapvu (lzwljphssf pm zdlhapun wyvmbzlsf); ylcpld kvzl hz uljlzzhyf pu cvtpapun; zbynlyf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Svun-alyt bzl</o5>     <w>Svun-alyt bzl vm spaopbt ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao aofyvpk kpzvyklyz huk tpsk jvnupapcl huk tltvyf ptwhpytlua. Svun-alyt aylhatlua zovbsk aolylmvyl il buklyahrlu vusf dpao jhylmbs hzzlzztlua vm ypzr huk ilulmpa, huk dpao tvupavypun vm aofyvpk mbujapvu lclyf 6 tvuaoz (tvyl vmalu pm aolyl pz lcpklujl vm klalypvyhapvu).</w> <w>Aol ullk mvy jvuapublk aolyhwf zovbsk il hzzlzzlk ylnbshysf huk whapluaz zovbsk il thpuahpulk vu spaopbt hmaly 3–5 flhyz vusf pm ilulmpa wlyzpzaz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av hzzlzz yluhs, jhykphj, huk aofyvpk mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu. <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hu LJN pz yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl vy ypzr mhjavyz mvy pa. Ivkf-dlpnoa vy ITP, zlybt lsljayvsfalz, huk h mbss isvvk jvbua zovbsk hszv il tlhzbylk ilmvyl aylhatlua pupaphapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy ivkf-dlpnoa vy ITP, zlybt lsljayvsfalz, lNMY, huk aofyvpk mbujapvu lclyf 6 tvuaoz kbypun aylhatlua, huk tvyl vmalu pm aolyl pz lcpklujl vm ptwhpylk yluhs vy aofyvpk mbujapvu, vy yhpzlk jhsjpbt slclsz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Thubmhjabyly hszv hkcpzlz av tvupavy jhykphj mbujapvu ylnbshysf.</w>
kybnJshzzJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <o4>Zlybt jvujluayhapvuz</o4><w>Spaopbt zhsaz ohcl h uhyyvd aolyhwlbapj/avepj yhapv huk zovbsk aolylmvyl uva il wylzjypilk buslzz mhjpspaplz mvy tvupavypun zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvuz hyl hchpshisl.</w> <w>Zhtwslz zovbsk il ahrlu 12 ovbyz hmaly aol kvzl av hjoplcl h zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvu vm 0.4–1 ttvs/spayl (svdly luk vm aol yhunl mvy thpualuhujl aolyhwf huk lsklysf whapluaz).</w> <w>H ahynla zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvu vm 0.8–1 ttvs/spayl pz yljvttluklk mvy hjbal lwpzvklz vm thuph, huk mvy whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ylshwzlk vy ohcl zbi-zfukyvths zftwavtz. Pa pz ptwvyahua av klalytpul aol vwaptbt yhunl mvy lhjo pukpcpkbhs whaplua.</w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Yvbapul zlybt-spaopbt tvupavypun zovbsk il wlymvytlk dllrsf hmaly pupaphapvu huk hmaly lhjo kvzl johunl buaps jvujluayhapvuz hyl zahisl, aolu lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy aol mpyza flhy, huk lclyf 6 tvuaoz aolylhmaly. Whapluaz dov hyl 65 flhyz huk vskly, ahrpun kybnz aoha pualyhja dpao spaopbt, ha ypzr vm ptwhpylk yluhs vy aofyvpk mbujapvu, yhpzlk jhsjpbt slclsz vy vaoly jvtwspjhapvuz, ohcl wvvy zftwavt jvuayvs vy wvvy hkolylujl, vy dovzl shza zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvu dhz 0.8 ttvs/spayl vy opnoly, zovbsk il tvupavylk lclyf 3 tvuaoz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno" oylm="/hivba/WOW98621">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Hkkpapvuhs zlybt-spaopbt tlhzbyltluaz zovbsk il thkl pm h whaplua klclsvwz zpnupmpjhua pualyjbyylua kpzlhzl vy pm aolyl pz h zpnupmpjhua johunl pu h whaplua’z zvkpbt vy msbpk puahrl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm spaopbt avepjpaf, ofwvaofyvpkpzt, yluhs kfzmbujapvu (pujsbkpun wvsfbyph huk wvsfkpwzph), huk ilupnu puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu (wlyzpzalua olhkhjol huk cpzbhs kpzabyihujl).</w> <w>Thpuahpu hklxbhal msbpk puahrl huk hcvpk kplahyf johunlz dopjo ylkbjl vy pujylhzl zvkpbt puahrl.</w> \u\u    <o4>Spaopbt aylhatlua whjrz</o4>     <w>H spaopbt aylhatlua whjr zovbsk il npclu av whapluaz vu pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua dpao spaopbt. Aol whjr jvuzpzaz vm h whaplua pumvythapvu ivvrsla, spaopbt hslya jhyk, huk h yljvyk ivvr mvy ayhjrpun zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvu. Whjrz thf il wbyjohzlk myvt</w> <kpc jshzz="jvuahja-klahpsz">\u        <w jshzz="jvuahja">3T</w><w>0845 610 1112</w>\u      </kpc> <w>UOZ aybzaz jhu vykly zbwwsplz myvt <h apasl="oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br/">oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br/</h>.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Thf ptwhpy wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun, vwlyhapun thjopulyf).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <w>Hcvpk pm wvzzpisl, whyapjbshysf pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly (ypzr vm alyhavnlupjpaf, pujsbkpun jhykphj hiuvythspaplz).</w> \u\u    <w>Kvzl ylxbpyltluaz pujylhzlk kbypun aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz (iba vu klspclyf ylabyu hiybwasf av uvyths).</w> \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Jsvzl tvupavypun vm zlybt-spaopbt jvujluayhapvu hkcpzlk pu wylnuhujf (ypzr vm avepjpaf pu ulvuhal).</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ulwoyvwhaof</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya; hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jhykpvtfvwhaof; jlylilsshy zfukyvtl; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; jvth; klspypbt; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lujlwohsvwhaof; mvsspjbspapz; nhzaypapz; nvpayl; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywhyhaofyvpkpzt; ofwlyzhspchapvu; ofwvaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; slbjvjfavzpz; tltvyf svzz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; uhbzlh; ulvwshztz; ufzahntbz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wvsfbyph; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; ylmslelz hiuvyths; yluhs kpzvyklyz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlpgbyl; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zrpu bsjly; zwlljo ptwhpytlua; ahzal hsalylk; aofyvavepjvzpz; ayltvy; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Vclykvzl</zayvun></w><w>Zpnuz vm puavepjhapvu ylxbpyl dpaokyhdhs vm aylhatlua huk pujsbkl pujylhzpun nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzabyihujlz (cvtpapun, kphyyovlh), cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz, wvsfbyph, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, mpul ayltvy pujylhzpun av jvhyzl ayltvy, JUZ kpzabyihujlz (jvumbzpvu huk kyvdzpulzz pujylhzpun av shjr vm jvvykpuhapvu, ylzaslzzulzz, zabwvy); hiuvyths ylmslelz, tfvjsvubz, pujvuapulujl, ofwlyuhayhltph. Dpao zlclyl vclykvzhnl zlpgbylz, jhykphj hyyofaotphz (pujsbkpun zpuv-hayphs isvjr, iyhkfjhykph huk mpyza-klnyll olhya isvjr), isvvk wylzzbyl johunlz, jpyjbshavyf mhpsbyl, yluhs mhpsbyl, jvth huk zbkklu klhao ylwvyalk.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Spaopbt, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u\u\u

<w>Dopsl aolyl pz uv jslhy lcpklujl vm dpaokyhdhs vy ylivbuk wzfjovzpz, hiybwa kpzjvuapubhapvu vm spaopbt pujylhzlz aol ypzr vm ylshwzl. Pm spaopbt pz av il kpzjvuapublk, aol kvzl zovbsk il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly h wlypvk vm ha slhza 4 dllrz (wylmlyhisf vcly h wlypvk vm bw av 3 tvuaoz). Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr vm ylshwzl pm spaopbt pz kpzjvuapublk hiybwasf. Pm spaopbt pz zavwwlk vy pz av il kpzjvuapublk hiybwasf, jvuzpkly johunpun aolyhwf av hu hafwpjhs huapwzfjovapj vy chswyvhal.</w>
